commands:
-- Gods -- Create a item by ID -- Create a item by name -- Reload configurations -- Summon a NPC -- Open the server -- Close the server -- Set a player to house owner -- Teleport to players, creatures or NPCs -- Teleport by SQMs -- Start raid -- teleport on higher floor -- teleport on lower floor
-- Gamemasters -- Teleport a player to you -- Summon a "wild" monster -- Summon a monster -- Kick a player -- Save server -- Clean map
-- Tutors -- Red broadcast message -- Check your money -- Check effects (0-26) -- Info about a player -- Info about how many players are online -- Info about house of a player -- Info about the server -- Go to your temple -- Go to your town
-- Players -- Sell your house to a player -- Buy house -- List of players online -- Frags
